name: Match Connect Challenge
description: Match Connect Challenge - The new match game is here, with brilliant Pirate objects. A journey filled with waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! Swap objects to clear the way, and match pieces to crush each challenge that lies ahead.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB or higher Storage: 50 MB available space
